title: Error loading MySQL database results in erased configuration
author: JasonN3
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
Don't save the configuration to the MySQL database until it has successfully loaded the configuration

## Current Behavior
<!--- If describing a bug, tell us what happens instead of the expected behavior -->
If there is an error loading, it will erase the ...
